document_data.caption: Lab paying close attention to Saleem.
document_data.name: Lab
document_data.mainbody: '''Lab '''was a she-[[mule]] and the constant companion of [[Saleem|Saleem the architect]] in [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Relationships: Lab and Saleem were inseparable. Saleem talked constantly with his hoofed companion while walking around the city. Though quite a few citizens of Huzuz thought Saleem was insane, some speculated that Lab was actually his ''[[Polymorph|polymorphed]]'' lover or even a [[genie]] disguised as a mule.
